article:
More and more students want to study in "hot" majors.As a  _   , many students want to   give up    their interests and study in these   _    such as foreign languages, international business and law, etc.
Fewer and fewer students choose scientific majors,   such as    maths, physics and biology, and art  _   , like history, Chinese and philosophy .
   Only a few     students can study in these "hot" majors, because the   _     of these "hot" majors is limited.
If   _    has no interest in his work or study,   _     can he do well? I   _   this from one of my classmates.He is   _    the countryside.His parents are farmers.Though he  _    biology, he chose "international business".He  _    to live a life which is different from   _    of his parents.
In the end, he found he was not   _     in doing business.He found all the subjects to be    _   .
  Maybe     this wouldn't have happened if he had chosen his major according to his own interests.
Choosing a major in university   does not    decide one's whole life.Majors   which    are not "hot" today may become the "hot" major of tomorrow.Choosing your major according to your own  _    is the best way to succeed.
